text:
🌟 Professional Summary
Motivated MBA candidate with a Bachelor of Commerce and hands-on experience in administration, management, and business projects. My academic journey is supported by practical experience in operations and strategic project work. I enjoy applying business concepts to real-world challenges and am building expertise in business analytics, digital transformation, and ethical decision-making.
